Verified
DataRobot
Enterprise AutoML and endtoend AI lifecycle
AI/ML
Enterprise AI platform combining AutoML, MLOps, and governance. Build and deploy models at scale with guardrails and approvals. Monitor drift, bias, and performance in production. Speed up delivery with blueprints and reusable components.
Automated machine learning MLOps AI lifecycle management
View Profile
Verified
H2O.ai
Opensource machine learning and Driverless AI
AI/ML
Open-source ML leader powering fast, interpretable models. Driverless AI automates feature engineering and model selection. Built-in explainability (SHAP, LIME) and compliance tooling. Flexible recipes to customize pipelines.
Open-source ML AutoML Driverless AI
View Profile
Verified
Particle
Fullstack IoT device cloud and connectivity
IoT
Full-stack IoT platform with Device OS, Cloud, and connectivity. Secure data ingestion, OTA firmware updates, and fleet health. Hardware modules and device SIM streamline pilots to scale. APIs and rules engine integrate with apps.
IoT device cloud Connectivity Device management
View Profile
Verified
Matterport
3D capture and digital twins for real spaces
Digital Twin
Create immersive digital twins using Pro cameras or mobile capture. Share and embed 3D walkthroughs for marketing and facilities. Annotate, measure, and analyze spaces with AI tools. APIs connect twins to property workflows.
3D capture Digital twins Space analytics
View Profile
Verified
Dell Edge
Edge compute platforms for onprem AI
Edge Computing
Edge platforms for onprem inference and streaming analytics. Ruggedized gateways and servers for harsh environments. Integrated lifecycle management and security. Run AI where data is generated to reduce latency.
Edge platforms On-prem AI Ruggedized compute
View Profile
Verified
Spatial
Immersive collaboration across devices
AR/VR
Build and host interactive 3D rooms on web, mobile, and headsets. Avatars, spatial audio, and cocreation tools for teams and events. No-code authoring with templates and assets. WebXR delivery for frictionless access.
Immersive collaboration 3D spaces XR experiences
View Profile
Verified
ConsenSys
MetaMask, Linea, and enterprise Web3
Blockchain/Web3
Web3 suite powering wallets, infra, and dev tools. MetaMask for secure key management; Infura for scalable RPC. Linea rollup for lowcost transactions. Enterprise consulting and audits for production-grade dApps.
Smart contracts MetaMask Linea rollup Enterprise Web3
View Profile
Verified
Graphcore
IPU hardware and software for AI at scale
Computing & Processing
Intelligence Processing Units (IPUs) for nextgen AI compute. Unlock parallelism for GNNs, transformers, and sparse workloads. Poplar SDK simplifies graph execution and memory management. Systems scale from dev kits to racks.
IPU processors AI acceleration Poplar SDK
View Profile
Verified
Boston Dynamics
Mobile robots for inspection and logistics
Robotics
Mobile robots for inspection and logistics. Spot automates rounds, thermal scans, and data capture. Stretch streamlines case handling in warehouses. Proven autonomy, robust sensing, and developer APIs.
Mobile robots Automation Autonomy
View Profile
Verified
Cisco
Networking, security, and observability
Connectivity & Networking
Endtoend networking with Catalyst and Meraki. SDWAN and SASE for secure, performant access. ThousandEyes provides internet and app visibility. Unified policy and observability across sites and cloud.

For Buyers

Find Your Perfect Technology Partner

Explore vetted vendors across emerging technologies and industry-focused solutions. Compare options, schedule demos, request quotes, and get the clarity you need to make confident decisionsall in one supportive platform.

  • Browse 1,200+ verified vendors
    Spanning AI, blockchain, IoT, cloud, and 50+ categories across proptech, fintech, medtech, contech, and more.
  • Get tailored, industry-specific insights
    Understand capabilities, strengths, limitations, and ideal fit for your unique use case and sector.
  • Schedule demos & request quotes
    Connect directly with vendor teams to learn more and explore solutions.
  • Compare options side-by-side
    Evaluate features, integrations, pricing approaches, and trade-offs with clear, objective analysis.
Start Exploring Vendors
For Vendors

Grow Your Business With Us

We provide a supportive space for emerging-tech vendors to showcase their solutions, connect with qualified B2B buyers, and build meaningful industry relationships. Our goal is simple: help your technology be discovered by the teams who need it most.

  • Share your solution with leading enterprises
    Engage with Fortune 500 companies, mid-market teams, and fast-growing startups exploring new technologies.
  • Build trust through a transparent vendor profile
    Highlight your capabilities, certifications, and strengths so buyers can understand your offering clearly.
  • Receive qualified leads and quote requests
    Connect directly with buyers who are actively researching solutions in your category.
  • Reach decision-makers across major industries
    Including healthcare, finance, real estate, supply chain, manufacturing, and transportation.
